title: A Developing Story With A Powerful Message
description:
Welcome back to another episode of In The Crease! Linda and Emily start off today's episode with a deep dive into a developing story out of Chicago regarding former Blackhawks player Kyle Beach, who is at the center of a sexual assault investigation. After that, they are joined by AJ Galante, former Danbury Trashers team owner, who has some interesting ties to the NHL and entertaining stories about his time in hockey.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Linda Cohn, Emily Kaplan
itunes:subtitle: Linda and Emily discuss the developing story out of Chicago regarding former Blackhawk Kyle Beach.
